SongName: Let Me Hold You (Turn Me On)
Album: Let Me Hold You (Turn Me On)
Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:09.82]For the longest time we jammin at the party
[00:12.01]And you’re whippin on beat
[00:13.65]Pushing everything on me
[00:15.44]We got Silento on repeat
[00:18.69]But if you think you’re gonna get away from me
[00:21.48]Better change your mind
[00:23.22]The Henny got me feeling right
[00:25.11]You’re going home with me tonight
[00:27.65]Let me hold you, girl, caress my body
[00:31.44]You got me going crazy you
[00:33.83]Turn me on, turn me on
[00:36.90]Let me jam you, girl whip all around me
[00:40.68]You got me going crazy you
[00:43.53]Turn me on, turn me on
[00:54.19]Turn me on, turn me on
[01:03.90]Turn me on, turn me on
[01:05.06]
[01:05.70]For the longest time you’re staring like you want me
[01:07.84]I can feel your eyes
[01:09.38]So go tell your friends goodbye, we can make our way outside
[01:14.87]If they think they’re gonna stop you coming with me
[01:17.01]Better change their minds
[01:19.00]The Henny got us feeling right
[01:20.95]You’re going home with me tonight
[01:23.54]Let me hold you, girl, caress my body
[01:27.37]You got me going crazy you
[01:29.91]Turn me on, turn me on
[01:32.80]Let me jam you, girl whip all around me
[01:36.55]You got me going crazy you
[01:39.34]Turn me on, turn me on
[01:52.56]Turn me on, turn me on
[01:58.99]Turn me on
[02:00.78]
[02:03.22]Let me hold you, girl, caress my body
[02:06.87]You got me going crazy you
[02:09.70]Turn me on, turn me on
[02:12.50]Let me jam you, girl whip all around me
[02:16.13]You got me going crazy you
[02:18.83]Turn me on, turn me on
